summary: Provides a collection of fast unit tests for the GLIGEN text‑to‑image diffusion pipeline, including helpers to create mock components and inputs, and checks core functionalities such as attention slicing, output format, batch versus single inference consistency, and scheduler compatibility.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, stability, and integration readiness of the GLIGEN text‑to‑image generation pipeline, enabling reliable deployment and faster development cycles.
